content:
OUT! STUMPED! A genuine leggie, around off, Binura Fernando gets lured into the drive and drags his back foot outside the crease. In an attempt to get back inside the crease, Binura Fernando lifts his back foot and Litton Das behind the stumps, dislodges the bails right at that moment. This is sent upstairs and the replay confirms that Binura Fernando's foot was in the air as Das broke the stumps and Bangladesh wins this contest by 83 runs.
Binura Fernando st L Das b R Hossain 6 (9b 1x4 0x6)
WIDE! Googly, going down the leg. Wided.
Floated wide outside off, Binura Fernando swings and misses.

OUT! CAUGHT BEHIND! Slower one, cutter angling across the batter. Maheesh Theekshana swings at it but manages only an outside edge that was dropping in front of the keeper. Litton Das dives in front and takes a decent catch to send the Lankan spinner back in the hut.
Maheesh Theekshana c L Das b M Rahman 6 (11b 0x4 0x6)
Back of a length around leg, Binura Fernando pulls this through mid-wicket for one.
Cutter, going across the batter. Binura Fernando swings and swings early. Gets beaten on the outside.
FOUR! Full and around off, Binura Fernando presents a full face of his bat and hammers this down to long off fence for a boundary. Something for the Lankan fans to cheer about.
Back of a length around off, Maheesh Theekshana smashes this to point and takes one.
WIDE! Bumper, wide down the leg. Wided.
Back of a length around middle and leg, Maheesh Theekshana charges down the track and looks for the pull but gets it off the inside and chops it to short third.
Too full, on off. Binura Fernando drives this to covers for no run.
Quicker and fuller around leg, Maheesh Theekshana tucks this away for one.
Fuller, around off and turning away from the batter. Maheesh Theekshana swings and gets a leading edge that drops just in front of Mehidy Hasan Miraz at backward point.
Darted into the stumps, Binura Fernando tucks this to square leg and takes a single.
Floated wide of off, Binura Fernando looks for the cut but misses out.
Tossed up on off, Maheesh Theekshana drives this to long off for one.
Nails the yorker on off to the new batter. Binura Fernando does well to block this out.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Jeffrey Vandersay looks to get cheeky but pays the price. Slower one, around off. Jeffrey Vandersay moves across and looks to ramp this over the short fine leg fielder. Gets it away from he sticker of his bat and only towards Mustafizur Rahman at short fine leg. Fizz had to track back and outstretch to his right to take this beauty.
Jeffrey Vandersay c M Rahman b M Saifuddin 8 (6b 0x4 1x6)
Short-pitched, around leg. Maheesh Theekshana gets this away towards deep square for a single.
On a length around off, Maheesh Theekshana pushes this to covers for no run.
Short-pitched, on leg. Jeffrey Vandersay goes for the pull but gets late at it. Gets it mistimed to square leg for one.
Good length on middle and leg, Maheesh Theekshana pushes this through mid on for a single.

A touch shorter and flatter through the air, around off, Jeffrey Vandersay goes for the reverse and misses. The ball hits his gloves and ricochets onto his body and drops into the ground. Litton Das leaps in front but can't quite get to the ball.
SIX! THAT HAS COME FROM NOWHERE! Tossed up off break on off, Jeffrey Vandersay tonks it over long off for a biggie.
Short on middle leg, Jeffrey Vandersay pushes it to short mid-wicket.
Fuller on middle, Theekshana looks to block it off the front foot and gets an inside edge that goes wide of short fine leg. Single taken.
Short, around off, Theekshana pushes it off the back foot to short cover.

OUT! CAUGHT! Sri Lanka has lost the plot completely! Tossed up off break on middle, inviting the batter to go big. Shanaka accepts the invitation as he goes for the slog sweep and doesn't middle it whatsoever as Tanzid Hasan at deep mid-wicket settles under it and gobbles it up. Mehidy Hasan Miraz has his first.
Dasun Shanaka c T Hasan b MH Miraz 20 (16b 2x4 0x6)
Tossed up, outside off, Dasun pushes it to point and takes a single.
Short on middle and leg, Jeffrey Vandersay works it into the leg side for one to get off the mark.

OUT! CAUGHT AND BOWLED! Tossed up leg break, given a lot of air, turning away, around off, Chamika Karunaratne looks to flick it and gets a leading edge, giving a dolly of a catch to Rishad Hossain.
Chamika Karunaratne c&b R Hossain 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)

BEATEN! Tossed up, leg break, slower through the air, outside off, Chamika Karunaratne looks to block it off the front foot and gets beaten. Litton Das takes off the bails and appeals for stumping. Third umpire called in. Chamika Karunaratne has his foot grounded as Litton takes off the bails. NOT OUT!

OUT! STUMPED! FOUR AND WICKET! Rishad Hossain has the last laugh! Tossed up leg break, given a lot of air, inviting the batter to hit it. Nissanka accepts the invitation and skips down the track. The ball dips and turns away past the outside edge. Litton Das does the rest as he whips off the bails in style.
Pathum Nissanka st L Das b R Hossain 32 (29b 2x4 1x6)
FOUR! Full toss outside off, Nissanka sits down on one knee and plays a flat bat hit past the bowler and picks up a boundary.
Short and down leg, Shanaka looks to play the sweep and top edges it. The ball goes over the keeper, and runs to the left of short fine leg. Two runs taken.

FOUR SWEPT AWAY! Full and outside off, Shanaka sweeps this one firmly wide of deep square leg for four. That one was hit hard as it travelled quickly to the boundary. The deep square leg fielder didn't have any chance.
Short on middle leg, Pathum Nissanka pulls it to the left of deep mid-wicket for one.
Short on middle , Shanaka knocks it towards long on for one.
Full on leg, Nissanka reverse scoops it towards short third man.
Fuller on leg, Shanaka flicks it towards deep mid-wicket for one.

FOUR! Short on middle, Shanaka is quick to rock back as he pulls it to the right of deep mid-wicket who runs to his right and puts in a dive in front, but misses the catch as the ball goes through him and hits the ropes. Four runs added.
Again short, on middle leg, Shanaka knocks it down to long on for one.
Short again, on middle, Nissanka pushes it along the ground to long on for one.
Short again, on middle leg, Shanaka works it off the back foot towards square leg for one.
Short on middle, Nissanka pulls it to the right of deep square leg for one.
Short on middle. Defended back to the bowler.

Slower through the air, on off, Nissanka skips down the track and chips it in the air towards long on. The fielder there possibly doesn't spot the ball as he collects it on the bounce. Single taken. Ahh, he possibly could have gone for the catch there.

Full on middle leg, Nissanak plays the sweep uppishly to the right of deep square leg. Rishad Hossain the fielder there runs to his right gets a bit low and stops the ball from going to the boundary. Two runs taken.
Short on middle, Shanaka works it off the crease towards deep mid-wicket for one.
Ful again, on middle leg, Shanaka skips down the track and flicks it. The ball goes in the gap between deep square leg and deep mid-wicket. Battters run two.
Fuller on middle, Nissanka flicks it towards long on for one.
From round the wicket, short in length, on middle, Nissanka makes a bit of room and punches it wide of deep extra cover for two runs.
Back of a length, on middle, Shanaka defends it off the back foot, right under his eyes.
Slower length ball on off, Nissanka makes some room and defends it wide of point for a single.
Back of a length outside off, Nissanka looks to push it into the off side and gets an under edge that goes on the bounce towards the bowler.
Slower full delivery, well outside off, Nissanka looks to get some bat on it as he reaches out for that one but fails to. Dot ball.
Short aimed at the body, Shanaka plays the pull towards square leg for one.
Back of a length on middle, Nissanka plays the pull to deep square for a single.
FOUR! NICELY DONE! Length ball swinging away, well outside off, plenty of width on offer. Shanaka places the cut to perfection as he plays it wide of point and picks up a boundary.
Slower short ball, just outside off, Nissanka plays the two-handed tennis pull towards deep mid-wicket for a single.
Full on middle, Shanaka flicks it towards deep mid-wicket for a single.
Back of a length around off. Defended towards cover point.
Length ball on off, Shanaka defends it to short cover.
Length ball sliding down leg, Shanaka misses the tickle. Wide given.

Yorker outside off, Asalanka looks to steer it and gets beaten on the outside edge. Oh, there's an appeal for LBW. Umpire is unmoved. Mohammad Saifuddin goes towards the captain, Litton Das, and convinces him to go for the review. Here's the third umpire on screen. UltraEdge coming up. Oh, my! There's a spike as the ball is near the bat and the third umpire tells the on field umpire to reverse the decision. OUT! Charith Asalanka goes!
Charith Asalanka (c) c L Das b M Saifuddin 5 (5b 1x4 0x6)
Length ball angled across the right-hander, well outside off, Nissanka has a slash at that one, but misses.
Full on middle, Charith Asalanka flicks it down to deep fine leg for a single.

FOUR! A boundary after 3 overs, and Charith Asalanka is off the mark! Overpitched on off, Asalanka stands tall and tonks this straight, over the bowler's head,, as the ball goes one bounce over the ropes.
A touch full again, shaping away, around off, Asalanka drives it to cover point.
Length ball shaping away in the channel outside off, Asalanka leaves it alone.

OUT! CAUGHT! Sri Lanka is in big trouble here! The third one is down inside the powerplay, and Shoriful Islam has his second. Full and swinging in on middle leg, Fernando plays the pickup that goes to the left of deep square leg, who covers a considerable amount of ground and takes a nice catch near the boundary. Shamim Hossain, the fielder there.
Avishka Fernando c S Hossain b S Islam 2 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Back of a length, on middle, Nissanka blocks it back to the bowler.
Back of a length on middle, Fernando plays the pull to the right of deep backwards square leg who runs to his right and collects the ball on the bounce. Single taken.
On a length on middle, Fernando blocks it right under his eyes.
Length ball on middle, Nissanka looks to push it into the off side and gets an inside edge that goes near the short fine leg region. Single taken.

DROPPED! It's tough to call it a drop, as that ball was travelling and the fielder at short mid-wicket jumped up, stretching his body to the fullest. He got to the ball with two hands, but the ball doesn't stick as it goes into the ground, and batters take a single.
Back of a length, around off, Nissanka plays the steer towards deep third for a single.
Full on leg, Fernando flicks it to short mid-wicket. Dot ball.

OUT! CAUGHT! SOFT DISMISSAL! Shoriful Islam bowls this on back of a length and shaping away, outside off, Perera plays a check drive which goes to the left of short cover who pouches it with ease. Rishad Hossain the fielder.
Kusal Perera c R Hossain b S Islam 0 (4b 0x4 0x6)
Well directed bouncer, on off, that zips off the surface. Perera goes for the pull and misses.
Full and swinging into the right-hander, on middle, Nissanka swings through the line and hits it to the left of deep fine leg. and picks up a single.
On a length, sliding down leg, Perera misses the flick as the ball hits his pads and goes behind the stumps. The keeper runs behind the ball and cuts it off. Batters run a leg bye.
On a length, on middle, Perera works it to short mid-wicket.
On a length around off, Pathum Nissanka drives this to cover for no run.

OUT! RUN OUT! Kusal Mendis pays the price for being complacent. On a length around off, Kusal Mendis pushes this towards the strong arm of Shamim Hossain, to his left, at point and sets off for a single. Kusal Mendis could have easily made it but he almost jogged at the end and paid the price for it as Shamim Hossain threw at the non-striker's end and struck the stumps directly with the batter short of his crease.
Kusal Mendis (wk) run out (Shamim Hossain) 8 (5b 2x4 0x6)
FOUR! Kusal Mendis continues from where he left off in the first game. Full and wide down the leg, Kusal Mendis ends up sweeping it wide to the left of short fine leg for four runs.
Good length around off, Pathum Nissanka rocks back and punches this away for one.
SIX! PULLED AWAY FOR SIX! Short-pitched, wide of off, Pathum Nissanka gets behind the line of it and nails the pull for a biggie over the deep mid-wicket fence.
Low full toss on off, Pathum Nissanka hammers this back towards the bowler, down and low to his left for no run.
LEG BYE! On a length around leg, Pathum Nissanka looks to tuck this through square but gets beat and deflects it off his pads for a single.
WIDE! On a length wide down the leg, Pathum misses out on the flick. Wided.
LEG BYE! Full and swinging in again, going down the leg though. Kusal Mendis gets hit on the pads and takes one as the ball rolls to cover.

WOAH! That swung in late. On a length, around off, Kusal Mendis goes for a leg glance but gets beaten as the ball tails back into the batter a bit late. KM gets lucky that I misses the off stumps as well.
FOUR! A gentle full toss on middle and leg. Kusal Perera slogs this, gets enough to lob the mid-wicket fieler and the ball has raced to the fence for four runs.
Back of a length around off, Pathum Nissanka cuts this to point and gets off the mark with a single.
On a length, around off, Pathum Nissanka punches this to mid off for no run. A watchful start.

FOUR! A boundary to end the innings and Bangladesh have posted 177 at the end of 20 overs. On a length around off, Mohammad Saifuddin moves to his leg, opens up the off side and drives this through cover for a boundary.

Full and swinging into the batter, Mohammad Saifuddin flicks this to deep backward square and takes two. A run-out check and the replay shows that Mohammad Saifuddin made his ground with a dive at the end.

OUT! RUN OUT! Shamim now has to walk back as he gets a taste of his own medicine that he gave to Jaker on the previous delivery. Yorker, wide outside off. Rishad Hossain fails to get bat on ball and the batter runs for a single. Kusal Mendis throws underarm onto the stumps, and strikes them with Shamim Hossain well short of his crease.
Shamim Hossain run out (Kusal Mendis) 48 (27b 5x4 2x6)

OUT! RUN OUT! Needless running from Shamim and Jaker Ali has to pay the price for it. Full and around leg, Shamim Hossain gets a bottom edge and the ball goes to the right of Kusal Mendis behind the stumps. Kusal Mendis gets rid of the glove on his right hand and aims at the stumps and hits them. Jaker Ali was nowhere near the crease and he kept running to the dug out.
Jaker Ali run out (Kusal Mendis) 3 (2b 0x4 0x6)

SIX! Another chance goes begging. On a length around the pads, Shamim Hossain moves inside the line of it and flicks this towards fine leg. The fielder was in with a good chance to poch it but he made a mess of it by overrunning it and then misjudging it around the fence. The ball strikes his palm and bounces on the other side of the rope for six.
TWO LEG BYES! On a length, around the pads, Shamim Hossain misses out on the flick and gets it deflected off the pads through square leg for two.
Quicker and fuller on leg, Shamim Hossain moves to his leg and drives this through cover for one.

Shamim Hossain looks to get clever with a trigger movement towards his off-stump even before Maheesh Theekshana lets go of the ball and MT shows his clever side and fires in a wide yorker, cramping Shamim for the room he was looking for.
FOUR! SHAMSHED AWAY FOR FOUR! Short of a length around off, Shamim Hossain stands up with the bounce and pulls this up and over mid-wicket for four.
Fulller around middle and leg, Jaker Ali flicks this through mid-wicket for one.
Short and wide outside off, Jaker Ali smashes this through cover-point and takes two.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Fuller, turning into the batter and cramping him for room. Litton Das looks for the slog sweep but gets a leading edge, straight towards Nuwan Thushara at short third. NT makes no mistake and pouches it.
Litton Das (c) c N Thushara b M Theekshana 76 (50b 1x4 5x6)
Full and wide outside off, Litton Das opens the face of his bat and pushes this to sweeper cover for a single.
Full and wide around off, Litton Das drives this to wide long off for two.
Clever from Binura as he fires a full and wide delivery outside off. Litton Das shuffled to his leg looking to open up the off sid ebut fails to get bat on ball.

SIX! CLOBBERED! Right in the slot, around middle and leg, Litton Das clears his front foot and gives it a proper slog. Connects right out of the middle of his bat and the ball ends up into the stands towards the deep mid-wicket region for a biggie.
Slower and fuller around off, Shamim Hossain drills this to long on for one.

FOUR! Boundaries galore from Shamim Hossain and he has injected the much-needed pace in this Bangladesh innings. Short and wide of off, Shamim Hossain plays the reverse and manages to hit this in-between the keeper's left and short third for four.

BYE! Needless from Kusal Mendis. Slower one, around off, Shamim Hossain misses out on the whack and Mendis behind the stumps throws at the stumps and hits. The batter never left his crease and the deflection off the stumps allowed the batters to take the single.

SIX! HIGH AND HANDSOME! By far the stroke of the game till now. On a length, around off, Shamim Hossain prods in front and goes through with a lofted drive. Connects perfectly and the ball has sailed over the fence at long off region for a biggie.
FOUR! GLORIOUS! Pitched up around off, Shamim Hossain strides to the pitch of the delivery and smashes this past cover like a tracer bullet for four.
Clever by NT as he darts one wide outside off after seeing Shamim Hossain jump down and across. The batter ends up leaving it.
Good length around off, Litton Das tucks this to long on for one.
LEG BYE! Good length on the pads, Shamim Hossain goes for the flick but misses and wears it on his pads towards square lg for one.

SIX! Insult to the injury. Tossed up, around off, Litton Das gets down on a knee and nails the slog sweep to perfection and clears the fence towards deep mid-wicket region with ease. Das makes Maheesh Theekshana feel even more guilty about the drop immediately.

DROPPED! Maheesh Theekshana makes a mess of a dolly. Tossed up, wide of off, Litton Das moves a bit to his leg and looks to slog this over long on. The bill sails off the outside off the bat around the bottom as well. It hangs in front of Maheesh Theekshana at long off but he overruns it and drops it. Two runs taken.

DROPPED! Litton has been dropped by Maheesh Theekshana on 58. Fuller, wide of off. Litton Das looks for the slog sweep but gets it off the outside of his bat and the ball hangs in front of Maheesh Theekshana for a long time. MT runs in rapidly from the fence at long off but end up running over it and fails to even get anything onto this. Two runs taken.
Tossed up on middle and leg, Shamim Hossain sweeps this to deep square and takes a single.
Full and wide outside off, Litton Das cuts this to deep point for a single.
Short and wide of off, Shamim smashes this to sweeper cover for one.

Floated across the batter. Shamim Hossain cuts this and finds the gap through point. The ball was destined to cross the fence but Jeffrey Vandersay had other ideas. JV runs aggressively to his left, puts in a full-stretched dive and saves a run for his side.
Flicker around off, Litton Das pushes this to long off for one.
WIDE! Darted way too wide outside off. Wided.

SIX! FIFTY FOR THE SKIPPER OF BANGLADESH! Way too full, wide outside off, Litton Das moves to his leg and lofts this up and over the bowler. The wind does the rest as it carries it over the fence towards long off for six.
Short and wide outside off, Shamim Hossain cuts this to deep point and takes one.
Fuller around middle and leg, Litton Das flicks this through mid-wicket and settles for one.
Floated on middle and leg, Shamim Hossain edges this off the inside towards short fine for a single.
Googly, around off. Shamim Hossain cuts this to short point and takes one.
Flighted on middle and off, Shamim Hossain gets inside his crease and blocks this out.
Fuller on the pads, Shamim Hossain steps across and sweeps this towards the left of Chamika Karunaratne at deep backward square and takes two.
Wrong'un around off, Shamim Hossain moves away from the stumps to his leg and cuts this to deep point for two. The batters were looking for just a single but a fumble in the deep allowed the second.
Pushed through on middle and leg, Litton Das flicks this through mid-wicket for one.

FOUR! Beautifully played for four. Short of a length, wide outside off. Begging Das to smash this over to the fence and the skipper of Bangladesh does that with ease. Rocks back and lofts this over extra cover for four runs.

FOUR! Back of a length arond off, Shamim Hossain hops onto his back foot, cuts this past point to his left this time and finds the fence for four. Avishka Fernando, running to his right from sweeper cover, puts in a good diving effort but it goes to vain as he fails to keep this inside the playing area.
Short-pitched, outside off. Litton Das slaps this to extra cover and rotates.
Short and wide outside off, Shamim Hossain cuts this to deep point for one.
On a length, angling across. Shamim Hossain goes for the square cut but misses.
FOUR! Well played by Shamim. Goood length, wide of off, Shamim Hossain leans a touch back and cuts this to the right of backward point and the ball has raced to the fence for four.
Slower one, wide outside off. Litton Das pushes this through cover-point for a comfortable rotation of strike.
Good length around leg, Litton Das rocks back and tucks this through mid-wicket for a single to close the over.
On a length around middle and leg, Shamim Hossain flicks this away to get off the mark with a single.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Slower one, around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz shuffles across to his off and goes for a ramp. Binura Fernando, cleverly, dishes out a slower one. Miraz was left with no pace to work with, still he goes through with the ramp and ends up spooning this over short fine leg for a regulation catch.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz c N Thushara b B Fernando 1 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Short-pitched, around leg. Litton Das helps this off his gloves to fine leg region for one.
Back of a length around middle and leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls this to deep mid-wicket for one.

OUT! Kusal Perera is having a good outing in the field as he takes another beauty to dismiss Tawhid Hridoy this time. Back of the hand, slower one, angling across the batter. Tawhid Hridoy looks for the cut through point again, gets a top edge dropping onto Kusal at short third. Kusal Perera dives in front and takes a good catch.
Tawhid Hridoy c K Perera b B Fernando 31 (25b 2x4 1x6)

Another couple to end the over. Back of a length around off, Litton Das cuts this well and wide of the fielder at point. The fielder puts in a dive, takes the sting out of it with a deflection to deep point for two.
On a length around off, Litton Das shuffles across to his off, ramps this towards long leg. Jeffrey Vandersay runs to his right, fields this and keeps it down to two.
Yet another slower one, Short-pitched, around off. Litton Das shimmies back inside his crease and looks for the upper-cut but misses out.
Short but a bit closer to the off-stump, cutter again. Tawhid Hridoy cuts this straight to point and steals a single.
Good length around middle and leg, Litton Das steps across and pulls this to deep mid-wicket for a single more.
Back of a length, slower one, wide outside off. Tawhid Hridoy dabs this through short third for a single.
Short-length leg break, around off, Das moves away and cuts it wide of deep extra cover and picks up two runs.
Short on off, Hridoy makes a bit of room and cuts it to deep extra cover for one.
FOUR! Lovely from Tawhid Hridoy! Full tossed up on off, Hridoy sits on one knee and slog sweeps this one in the gap between deep square leg and deep mid-wicket to pick up a boundary.
Full on middle, Litton sweeps this one to deep square leg for one.

Oh, stumping chance missed! Beautifully bowled leg break from Jeffrey Vandersay! Tossed up, slower through the air, luring the batter into the shot, Litton seeing the flight on offer, skips down the track to go inside out and misses as the ball dips and turns away. But Kusal Mendis doesn't manage to collect it and ends up fluffing the chance as Litton Das comes back in his crease.
Short and on off, Hridoy manages to cut it to short third man and picks up a quick single.
Flatter and quicker on off, Das again makes some room and cuts it to the left of deep extra cover for a single.
Slower full delivery on off, Das makes some room and drives it along the ground to deep extra cover for a single to retain the strike.
Full on middle leg, Hridoy flicks it down to deep square leg for a single. That single brings up the 50-run stand between these two.

Again short, this time on middle leg, Das skips down the track as the ball gets high on him, and he somehow manages to pull it around the mid on region. The man from mid off runs to his right and cuts it off.
Short ball, just outside off, Litton looks to upper cut it and misses.

SIX! INNOVATION FROM Litton Das! 50 UP FOR Bangladesh! On a length on middle, Litton Das shuffles across a bit and scoops this over the deep fine leg fence for a six. The fine leg fielder was inside the ring, so that shot was always on.
Back of a length on off, Hridoy skips down the track and works it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Tossed up leg break on off, Hridoy goes for the slog sweep and hits it to the left of deep square leg who runs to his left and cuts it off.
Short outside off, Das cuts it to deep point for one.
Again the googly on a shorter length, on middle, Hridoy works it off the back foot to deep square leg for one.
Shorter googly, on middle, Das works it into the leg side for a single.
Tossed up leg break on middle, Hridoy drills it down to long on for one.
Full leg break on off, Das drives it to long on for a single.
A touch short on middle leg, Das pushes it to the right of the bowler and takes one. Maheesh Theekshana runs behind the balll and cuts it off with a slide.
Fuller on middle, Tawhid drives it to long on for a single.
Short length off break, on middle leg, Tawhid pushes it to short cover.
Short and quick on off, Tawhid pushes it back to the bowler, again.
Full on off, Tawhid pushes it back to the bowler.
A touch short-length delivery, on off, Das drives it to long on for a single.
On a length pace off, on off, Litton steers it to deep third man for a single.
Good length on middle ,Tawhid defends it off the crease.
Another pace off ball on back of a length, on off, Das works it off the back foot to deep square leg for a single.

SIX! Oh, Litton's picked the bones out of that one! Another slower delivery that lands on back of a length, just outside off, Litton sits deep in his crease and pulls this one over deep mid-wicket for a maximum.
Back of a length, pace off delivery, on off, Hriody guides it to backward point and takes a single.
On a length on off, Das pushes it towards mid off and takes a single.
Short length carrom ball on off, Das backs away a bit and punches it to the left of mid off for a single to retain the striek.
Yorker on middle, Das drives it to short cover.
Short length carrom ball on off, Hridoy guides it to backward point and sets off for a quick single.
A touch fuller, carrom ball on middle and off, Hridoy flicks it with soft hands to the left short fine leg and calls for two and eventually completes it. Good running.
Another shortish length ball, on middle, Das pushes it off the crease to long on for a single.
Short on off, Litton punches it back to the bowler.
On a length on middke Litton Das flicks it to short mid-wicket, and picks up a single to retain the strike.

Tawhid Hridoy again charges down the track, seeing that Dasun Shanaka drags his length back and lands it on 8-10M area, on middle, Shanaka manages to work it into the leg side to the left of short fine leg. Single taken.

FOUR! Lucky for Tawhid Hridoy, but he will take it. Full and shaping away, outside off, Tawhid Hridoy skips down the track and looks to go inside out as he gets an outside edge that flies over short third man for a boundary.
SIX! What a shot! Full on leg, Tawhid Hridoy skips down the track and tonks it over cow corner for a biggie.
On a length on off, Das drives it to the left of deep point and picks up a single.
Slower yorker on middle, Das pushes it to short cover.
Full on middle, Das digs it out as he pushes it into the leg side and gets a single.
BEATEN! Full and shaping away, Litton Das looks to play a cover drive and gets beaten as the ball whizzes past his outside edge.
Nuwan Thushara persists with the attacking line and bowls this full, shaping away and on off. Tawhid Hridoy slices this through backward point for one.
Good length on middle and leg, Tawhid Hridoy pushes this to silly mid on for no run.
Full and moving away, on off, Tawhid Hridoy drives it to cover point.
Good length, around off, Litton Das punches this through point for a single.

OUT! CAUGHT! What a catch! Kusal Perera has pulled off a screamer! This is a full delivery from Binura Fernando, swinging away again, outside off, Tanzid Hasan looks to drive it on the up and gets a thick outside edge that flies to the left of Kusal Perera at Short third who dives to his left and takes the catch airborne with both hands. In fact, Kusal Perera was standing very fine at short third position.
Tanzid Hasan c K Perera b B Fernando 5 (8b 0x4 0x6)
BEATEN! Full swinging away, outside off, Tanzid Hasan skips down the track and looks to go over mid off, but the ball swings away quite a bit as it beats the outside edge of his bat.

Excellent from Dasun Shanaka, diving to his left at mid-wicket and saving three runs for the side. On a length around middle and leg, Litton Das leans onto it and flicks this all along the ground. The ball was hit well and was routed to the fence, had it gone past Dasun but the fielder did well and fields this, keeping it down to one.
Short and wide around off, Tanzid Hasan cuts this through cover-point and takes one.
On a length around middle and off, Tanzid drives this straight back to the bowler and Binura Fernando does well to dive and field this to his left.
Full and on off, Tanzid Hasan drives this to cover for no run.

OUT! TIMBER! Everyone knew this was on the cards, even Parvez Hossain Emon would be aware of the inswinging yorker around leg. Emon stood outside his crease and looked to lofts this over mid off but the ball moves in late and gets through the gate between bat and pad of Emon and rattles the timber.
Parvez Hossain Emon b N Thushara 0 (3b 0x4 0x6)
Inswinging, fuller one, around middle and leg. Parvez Hossain Emon jumps down the track and thumps this back to the bowler.
Good length around middle and off, Tanzid Hasan opens the face of his bat and dabs this to backward point and takes one.
Full and on off, Tanzid Hasan pushes this well but straight at covers.

LEG BYE! Another one, swinging in, around leg. Hitting Parvez Hossain Emon on the full as he looks to flick this towards the leg side but misses. The ball deflects off his pads and rolls to point for one.

Full and swinging into the left hander, on middle leg, Hasan flicks it along the ground to the left of the wide deep fine leg fielder. Some really good running from the batters as they complete three runs.
